overview: Anna, a young French educated bourgeois lady is a famous and talented television journalist. She lives with Horst, a political man, 20 years older than her.  Believing that she leads the perfect love, her editor in chief confidentially shows her, before publication, compromising pictures of her husband in a very scandalous position. The scandal will soon be revealed to all...  Blackmail, campaign for destabilization, revenge or reality? Under the guise of a report, Anna and her not so prude female collaborator will try anything to discover the truth, without hesitating to give all of themselves.  This investigation will drive her to an S&M mistress, sale of slaves in parking lots, a gang bang in swinger clubs...and on the trail of a very secret organization called « Fidelia ».
tagline: A young journalist will try anything to discover the truth
title: The Journalist
